meanings.sent1: The surtaxed citizens struggled to make ends meet.
meanings.sent2: The surtaxed property owners found it difficult to pay their bills.
meanings.sent3: The surtaxed family had to cut down on their expenses to afford the extra tax.
meanings.sent4: The surtaxed businesses were drowning in financial obligations.
meanings.sent5: The surtaxed individuals felt the heavy burden of the additional tax.

meanings.sent1: The government surtaxed the luxury items to increase revenue.
meanings.sent2: The authorities surtaxed imported goods to protect local industries.
meanings.sent3: The mayor jokingly threatened to surtax all sugary drinks in the city.
meanings.sent4: The decision to surtax online purchases surprised many consumers.
meanings.sent5: The proposal to surtax high-income earners sparked a heated debate.

meanings.sent1: The surtaxed small businesses struggled to stay afloat.
meanings.sent2: The surtaxed middle class felt the weight of the additional financial burden.
meanings.sent3: The surtaxed homeowners joked about living in a 'tax castle'.
meanings.sent4: The surtaxed population demanded tax relief from the government.
meanings.sent5: The surtaxed economy faced challenges in attracting new investments.
